entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
